means: 老子（中国哲学家，道家的创始人）

sentence.Network_en: According to the story, Lao - tzu, the older of the two sages, thought very little of Confucius.
sentence.Network_cn: 据说, 两位圣人中那位年长的老于很瞧不起孔子.

sentence.Network_en: One tale about Confucius -- possibly no more than a legend -- tells how he once met Lao - tzu.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一个可能是传说的故事讲述了他和老子相见的故事.

sentence.Network_en: However, Lao Tzu did leave us a problem in translation.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, 老子留给了我们一个翻译的问题.

list.abs: a critical biography of lao tzu ., 老子评传.
on enlightenment of lao tzu philosophy to code of conduct for public servants of state ., 老子哲学思想对国家公务员行动准则的启示.
a critical biography of lao tzu ., 老子评传.

means.word_mean: 1. Chinese philosopher regarded as the founder of Taoism (6th century BC)

auth_sentence.content: It also helps Lao people to make more money.

auth_sentence.content: Lao Lan said as he kicked the dead animal.

auth_sentence.content: First to do this was none other than Lao Lan.
